Package org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectra

Interface Summary
NormalizedSpectrum This interface provides various methods for V magnitude normalized spectra.
 

Class Summary
ABReference  
AirGlowSpectrum This class provides an air glow spectrum.
Atmosphere Implements an atmosphere.
Blackbody This class describes the spectrum of blackbody radiation.
EmissionLine This class describes the spectrum of an emission line.
FluxNormalization This class provides a static method for obtaining the normalization factor which ensures that the normalized flux matches a V magnitude at the respective reference wavelength.
FluxNormalizationDescriptor Describes a flux normalizsation
KC96GalaxyTemplate  
KuruczModel This class describes a Kurucz atmosphere model.
NormalizedKC96GalaxyTemplate  
NormalizedKuruczModel This class describes a power law spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
PowerLaw This class describes a power law spectrum.
SkySpectrum This class computes a sky spectrum (ergs/s/A/arcsec^2).
SolarSpectrum This class provides a solar spectrum.
TargetSpectrum This class describes the target spectrum.
UBVRIMagnitudes This class provides the magnitudes for the U, B, V, R and I band.
UserSuppliedSpectrum This class describes the user-supplied spectrum given by some file.
VNormalizedBlackbody This class describes a blackbody spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
VNormalizedPowerLaw This class describes a power law spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
VNormalizedUserSuppliedSpectrum This class describes a blackbody spectrum which is normalized so that it matches a V magnitude.
